titleStmt.title: A declaration of the counties of Kent and Essex in pursuance of their petitions concerning the Kings Majesty. The further proceedings of the petitioners of the county of Surrey, and newes from Kingston. With a letter from Burry, concerning seven hundred of the townes-men taking up armes to defend themselves, and their declaration thereupon.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
